name: TNO Dating Sim Demo
description:
This is the demo version of TNO Dating Simulator. All backgrounds, and character sprites are placeholders (they will be turned into anime girls later). Additionally, all sprites are taken directly from the TNO mod, or edited slightly. A soundtrack, and sound effects are also planned for the full release. 

Art for Germania was taken from here. https://www.artstation.com/artwork/0Xll84

Art for the inside of the Volkshalle from here: https://the-man-in-the-high-castle.fandom.com/wiki/Volkshalle

Art for Nord-Paris from here: https://www.reddit.com/r/TNOmod/comments/ed8tu7/the_borderline_between_burgundy_...

And the gorgeous cover image is by HonorableDeath#3454.

Aside from that, everything was done internally by me, and was a result of my mental illness. Yes, I need help for creating this monstrosity.

FAQ: When will the full release be done?  Soon + 1 week.

This is a passion project. I don't even know how to code. I am the sole developer, and this project runs on fumes. 

Discord: https://discord.gg/dcV8GyYTVR (This is a permanent invite, so it won't expire.)
